name: Safey Shoppy
description:
Hello, we are participating in a Game Competition to create awareness about Covid-19 virus.

Here's the story :

A girl being told by her mother to buy grocery from the convenience store, but because of the virus, she needs to follow certain procedure to stay safe and buy what she needs. She will need to use mask, wash her hands, stay away from other people, and using disinfectant.

Have a fun and safe shopping time!
